title: Insane Ping Spikes after Patch 7.7
body:
Hey, I was just wondering if anyone could explain why I've been getting so many ping spikes this patch? I normally get anywhere between 18-22 ping, but as of this week I've been getting about 1000-4000 ping like every few minutes and disconnecting in some games. It's really making the game unplayable at times bc of the amount of lag.

TLDR:
Huge ping spikes, normal ping is 18-22, but after patch 7.7 it's been jumping from 1000-4000.
If you know how to fix this, send help please!!

Thanks so much guys!

replies.body:
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 
Yeouch 4000 ping?! That's definitely not gonna work out. That kind of intense ping spike could be caused by packet loss, which would mean your ping is only spiking when your network misses bits of information. Grab your recent game logs that gave you trouble, and pop it into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let me know what it says!
